name: Hide And Squeak (Gorethumb, tornado cub, JeffersonToal, TheZoeAG)
name_original: Hide And Squeak (Gorethumb, tornado cub, JeffersonToal, TheZoeAG)
description:
Beneath the floorboards, Mousepapa is telling stories. 

Tales of daring.  Of mousey heroism. Of mousish mischief. 

Mousetales. 

And now a little mouseling wants to hear the most terrifying tale of all.

They can barely bring themselves to say it! 

They want to hear the one about the cats...
